dataList.name: Portrait Afterimage Sighting
dataList.desc: If a Skill Slot is attached to the Master's Portrait, a shockwave in the same color as the aura around the Master's Portrait occurs when the Portrait is revealed

dataList.name: Throwing Out the Interloper
dataList.desc:
When the Portraits are present:
- จบเทิร์น: Once 3 turns have passed since the Portraits have appeared...
     - สร้าง [UninvitedGuest] to the earliest-Deployed enemy without [UninvitedGuest]
     - Incinerate all Portraits. สร้าง double the amount of fake Portraits burned as [Sinking] Potency and Count against all enemies. ได้รับ [AttackUp] and [Protection] ในเทิร์นถัดไป

dataList.name: Interloper Hunt
dataList.desc: If the target has [UninvitedGuest], แต้มแคลชสกิล +1 and deal +20% damage

dataList.name: Ooh, Dear Master...
dataList.desc:
When the Portraits are present, reduce Affinity & Attack Type Resistances by 0.5, และได้รับ 8 [Protection].
If the enemies defeated the Master's Portrait, สร้าง [UninvitedGuest] to the unit that defeated it; then ได้รับ 0.5 Phys. Resistances and 5 Fragile for the ในเทิร์นถัดไป.

dataList.name: You Must Be the Interloper's Family?
dataList.desc: When an enemy has [UninvitedGuest], สร้าง [UninvitedGuest] against an enemy without [UninvitedGuest] every time this unit loses 10% of its HP (สูงสุด 4 enemies)

dataList.name: Peering Gaze
dataList.desc: As long as this unit exists, สร้าง 1 [Sinking] Potency and Count every turn

dataList.name: Interloper
dataList.desc:
When this unit is defeated, สร้าง [UninvitedGuest] against the enemy that attacked this unit last
- If 4+ enemies have [UninvitedGuest], this effect does not activate

dataList.name: Peering Gaze
dataList.desc: As long as this unit exists, สร้าง 1 [Sinking] Potency and Count every turn

dataList.name: Interloper
dataList.desc:
When this unit is defeated, สร้าง [UninvitedGuest] against the enemy that attacked this unit last
- If 4+ enemies have [UninvitedGuest], this effect does not activate

dataList.name: A Familiar Connector
dataList.desc:
ตามทุก ๆ [ConnectedPlug], ได้รับ 1 Min. Speed value, 1 [Vulnerable], and 1 [AttackDmgUp]
When this unit is Staggered ในเทิร์นถัดไป due to having 3 [ConnectedPlug], ได้รับ 4 [Vulnerable]

dataList.name: Overcurrent
dataList.desc: จบเทิร์น: ตามทุก ๆ 10 [Charge] Count on self, ได้รับ 1 [VioletDamageUp] ในเทิร์นถัดไป (สูงสุด 2)

dataList.name: Want to be Free
dataList.desc:
At 25% HP, starting this turn, ได้รับ 1 of the following every turn. The values are cumulative and do not expire.
- ได้รับ 1 [ParryingResultUp]
- ได้รับ 1 [AttackDmgUp]
- ได้รับ 1 [Vulnerable]

dataList.name: Generator
dataList.desc: จบเทิร์น: If this unit does not have [ConnectedPlug] and [ThundercloudFormation], summon a Generator once ในเทิร์นถัดไป.

dataList.name: Gathering Lightning Cloud
dataList.desc:
จบเทิร์น: Apply 4 [ThundercloudFormation] to the Dreaming Electric Sheep ในเทิร์นถัดไป.
Does not apply more of this effect if it already has this effect.

dataList.name: Detached Anti-Ovine Grounding Plug
dataList.desc: When hit, สร้าง 1 [AntiSheepGround] to the Attacker (มีผลเทิร์นละครั้ง)

dataList.name: Safety Plug
dataList.desc: Reduces all damage taken to 0

dataList.name: Prelude of the Banquet
dataList.desc:
Turn 2 Start: Summon the retinue of the King in Binds.
The King has twelve retainers. Upon the death of a retainer, another will fill its place until there are none.

dataList.name: Closing of the Banquet
dataList.desc: When all retainers are defeated, the King joins the fight.

dataList.name: NOTHING TO SEE HERE
dataList.desc: NOTHING TO SEE HERE

dataList.name: Snapping Bandages
dataList.desc: When the Body Part is destroyed, apply [BandageOfTheBoundKing] on all enemies.

dataList.name: Retainer of the King in Binds
dataList.desc:
- ได้รับ [BandageOfTheBoundKing] and [BigWelcome] for this Encounter.
- At ทุกครั้งที่เริ่มเทิร์น, the King in Binds blesses this unit with grace.
- The grace of the King in Binds changes every turn, in the following order: [Enhancement], SP Heal, and HP Heal. If there are less than 6 surviving Retainers(Peccatulum Invidiae), boost the grace's strength.

dataList.name: NOTHING TO SEE HERE
dataList.desc: NOTHING TO SEE HERE

dataList.name: LOOK AWAY!
dataList.desc: LOOK AWAY!

dataList.name: Refracted Struggle
dataList.desc: At 10+ Clashes against the same enemy, randomly ได้รับ or lose แต้มแคลชสกิล by (Clash Count / 10) in a Clash. (rounded down)

dataList.name: Peccatulum Invidiae Class 2
dataList.desc: Deal +15% damage and take -15% damage

dataList.desc: Entry SP +30
